title: Right reformation: or, The reformation of the church of the New Testament, represented in Gospell-light. In a sermon preached to the Honourable House of Commons, on Wednesday, November 25. 1646. Together with a reply to the chief contradictions of Master Love's sermon, preached the same day. All published for the good of the faithfull, at their desire. / By William Dell, minister of the Gospel, attending on his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax.
author: Dell, William, d. 1664.
publisher: Printed by R. White, for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spred-Eagle, near the West end of Pauls.,
notes: In two parts. Part 2, "A reply to Mr. Love's contradictions", has a caption title; pagination and register are continuous; Love, in his "Short and plaine animadversions" (Wing L3174) calls this part "an unlicensed pamphlet".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
